subject: Olympic Games
Canoes and Canoeing
lead_paragraph: One day before the German Olympic trials, Birgit Fischer, the 50-year-old eight-time Olympic champion, was told by her personal doctor and the team doctor that she could not compete.
snippet: One day before the German Olympic trials, Birgit Fischer, the 50-year-old eight-time Olympic champion, was told by her personal doctor and the team doctor that she could not compete.
